work-item.field:
Think about an easy use case you might have during your Polarion projects and implement a function and/or condition.
Examples could be to check for specific values in a field as a condition. For a function you can set a field based on several other fields. An example is used in PolarionÂ´s ISO26262 template. In this template an ASIL level is set based on 3 different enumerations.
